CustomField.formula: IF( npsp__Deceased__c = False, PG_Age_Score__c + PG_Donor_Year_Score__c + PG_Capacity_Score__c + PG_5_Year_Donation_Score__c , 0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: higher scores indicate stronger PG prospects, based on real time CG data (max score: 13)
CustomField.label: PG Prospect Rating
